title: 2 cryptocurrencies set for massive unlocks to avoid trading this week
title_zh: 本周应避免交易的两种将大规模解锁的加密货币
summary_en: Finbold warns traders about two major token unlocks this week that could add selling pressure: Solana (SOL) will unlock 502,930 SOL (~$121.22M, 0.09% of circulating supply), and Official Trump (TRUMP) will unlock 4.89M TRUMP ($58.82M, ~1.52% of circulating supply). The piece notes that unlocks often weigh on near-term prices, with impact varying by market conditions. It cites spot prices at press time (SOL ~$236; TRUMP ~$8.57) but stresses broader sentiment also matters.
summary_zh: Finbold 提醒本周有两项大额代币解锁，或对价格形成抛压：Solana（SOL）将解锁 502,930 枚 SOL（约 1.2122 亿美元，约占流通量 0.09%）；Official Trump（TRUMP）将解锁 489 万枚 TRUMP（约 5,882 万美元，约占流通量 1.52%）。文章强调，代币解锁常在短期内压制价格，其影响还取决于当时的整体市场情绪，并给出发稿时的现价（SOL 约 236 美元；TRUMP 约 8.57 美元）。
best_quote_en: While intended to stagger supply and prevent shocks, they often weigh on prices in the short term.
best_quote_zh: 虽然解锁旨在分散供应、避免冲击，但它们常会在短期内压低价格。

title: Kraken ETH Withdrawal: A Massive $102.2M Transfer Unveiled
title_zh: Kraken 以太坊提现：1.022 亿美元巨额转出
summary_en: The article reports a large withdrawal from Kraken: a newly activated wallet moved 21,925 ETH (~$102.24M) off the exchange, flagged by on-chain analytics firm Onchain Lens. It outlines possible explanations (institutional buy, whale movement, or internal operations) and discusses potential—but not guaranteed—market impacts of such transfers. The piece also explains how on-chain data helps track unusual flows and why context matters more than any single transaction.
summary_zh: 文章称，一笔来自 Kraken 的巨额提现引发关注：一个新启用的钱包从交易所转出 21,925 枚 ETH（约 1.0224 亿美元），由链上分析机构 Onchain Lens 监测到。文中给出可能原因（机构建仓、巨鲸调仓、或交易所内部操作），并强调此类转账对市场的影响并非必然，需结合更广泛的行情与情绪解读。同时介绍了链上数据对识别异常资金流的价值。
best_quote_en: This single Kraken ETH withdrawal amounted to 21,925 ETH, which translates to a staggering $102.24 million at the time of the transaction.
best_quote_zh: 这笔来自 Kraken 的单笔 ETH 提现共计 21,925 枚，以当时价格折合约 1.0224 亿美元。

title: Long Wait for Ether Profits as Exit Queue Surges to Record 45 Days
title_zh: 以太坊赎回队列创纪录达 45 天，获利等待时间拉长
summary_en: Ethereum’s validator exit queue has climbed to a record ~45 days after spiking to about 2.6M ETH. The surge coincides with ETH revisiting >$4,700 and is attributed to profit-taking and validator rebalancing; Kiln Finance’s mass withdrawal tied to a security incident also contributed. CryptoQuant notes staking inflows remain robust, entry queue is ~600k ETH, and exchange inflows of unstaked ETH are moderate—suggesting limited immediate sell pressure unless inflows accelerate. ETH hovered near ~$4,550 at press time, ~6.5% below the Aug 24 ATH of $4,946.
summary_zh: 以太坊验证者退出队列升至历史新高，赎回等待约 45 天，队列规模一度达约 260 万枚 ETH。该现象与 ETH 再度上探 4,700 美元有关，主要由获利了结与验证者再平衡驱动；同时，因安全事件引发的 Kiln Finance 大额提现也推高了队列。CryptoQuant 指出，质押流入仍稳健，进入队列约 60 万枚 ETH，且被赎回的 ETH 流入交易所并不显著——除非交易所净流入激增，短期抛压或有限。发稿时 ETH 在约 4,550 美元一线，距离 8 月 24 日 4,946 美元历史高点约差 6.5%。
best_quote_en: The Ethereum exit queue is at its highest ever waiting time, with a whopping 45 days to unstake the asset.
best_quote_zh: 以太坊退出队列的等待时间创下历史新高——赎回需要长达 45 天。

title: pump.fun Captures 90.6% of Solana Launchpad Market Share — Jupiter Data (Sept 15)
title_zh: pump.fun 占据 90.6% Solana 发射台市场份额——Jupiter 数据（9月15日）
summary_en: A 24-hour snapshot from Jupiter’s Data Dashboard shows strong concentration in Solana launchpads: pump.fun leads with 90.6% market share, followed by Letsbonk (5.18%) and Believe (1.66%). The piece stresses these are short-term rankings and urges considering liquidity and concentration when assessing token launch dynamics.
summary_zh: Jupiter 数据面板的 24 小时快照显示 Solana 发射台市场高度集中：pump.fun 以 90.6% 份额居首，Letsbonk 占 5.18%，Believe 占 1.66%。文章提醒这是短期排名，应结合流动性与集中度评估代币发行生态。
best_quote_en: pump.fun held the leading position with 90.6% of market share.
best_quote_zh: pump.fun 以 90.6% 的市场份额位居第一。

title: Bitcoin Stagnation Explained: Whales Profit-Take in $115K–$125K Zone
title_zh: 比特币为何停滞：巨鲸在 11.5万–12.5 万美元区间获利了结
summary_en: CryptoPotato reports BTC is stuck between $115k–$125k as whales have sold 116,000 BTC ($13B) over the past 30 days—the largest dump since July 2022. Analyst Doctor Profit identifies that band as a key profit-taking zone; meanwhile spot Bitcoin ETF inflows cooled to ~500 BTC/day, leaving insufficient absorption to power a breakout. Despite macro headlines, BTC has mostly moved sideways, with 7-day trading between ~$110,870 and ~$116,705 and capital rotating to alts (e.g., PEPE, DOGE).
summary_zh: 报道称，比特币在 11.5 万–12.5 万美元区间横盘，过去 30 天巨鲸抛售约 11.6 万枚 BTC（约 130 亿美元），为自 2022 年 7 月以来最大规模。分析师 Doctor Profit 将该区间视为主要获利了结带；现货比特币 ETF 日均净流入降至约 500 枚 BTC，吸收能力不足以推动突破。尽管有宏观消息面扰动，BTC 近一周基本横盘（~11.087 万–11.6705 万美元），部分资金转向山寨币（如 PEPE、DOGE）。
best_quote_en: Whales sold 116K BTC ($13B) in 30 days, the largest dump since July 2022.
best_quote_zh: 过去30天巨鲸抛售11.6万枚BTC（约130亿美元），为自2022年7月以来最大。

title: Cracking the code of vibe coding
title_zh: 破解 Vibe Coding 的密码
summary_en: Pete Sena explains 'vibe coding'—building apps by describing them to AI—and argues it’s real and rapidly democratizing software creation. He warns that while creation is now easy, maintainability, security, and true craftsmanship suffer if makers don’t understand systems. He outlines four frameworks: creation vs. maintenance; three tiers of creators (prompt engineer → architect → innovator); intellectual leverage over execution; and the specialization paradox. He also notes distribution becomes the key moat as build cycles collapse, potentially disrupting no-code tools. The takeaway: use AI as augmentation, keep fundamentals strong, and focus on solving the right problems.
summary_zh: 作者 Pete Sena 介绍了“vibe coding”：用自然语言对 AI 描述想要的应用并快速生成可用产品。这种方式让软件创作被大幅民主化，但他提醒：如果不了解底层系统，维护性、安全性与“匠艺”会受损。文章提出四个框架：创作 vs 维护的分野；创作者的三层级（提示工程师→解决方案架构师→系统创新者）；从“执行杠杆”到“思维杠杆”；以及“专业化悖论”。此外，随着开发—上市周期被压缩，“分发能力”成为新护城河，并将冲击传统无代码平台。结论是：把 AI 当增强而非替代，夯实基础，专注选择正确的问题。
best_quote_en: Vibe coding excels at creation but struggles with maintenance.
best_quote_zh: Vibe coding 在“创作”上很强，但在“维护”上却吃力。

title: Rolling Stone’s parent company sues Google over AI Overviews
title_zh: 《滚石》母公司就 Google“AI 总结”提起诉讼
summary_en: The Verge reports that Penske Media Corporation (publisher of Rolling Stone and The Hollywood Reporter) filed a lawsuit against Google alleging the AI Overviews feature reduces clicks to original articles and harms revenue. PMC says affiliate-link revenue is down by over one-third this year and argues it’s coerced into allowing its content in AI Overviews or risk losing search visibility. The piece situates the case among broader publisher pushback (e.g., Chegg and European independents) and includes Google’s response that AI Overviews make search more helpful and drive traffic.
summary_zh: 《The Verge》称，《滚石》《好莱坞报道者》的母公司 Penske Media 起诉 Google，指控“AI 总结”功能让用户无需点进原文，导致流量与收入受损。PMC 称其联盟链接收入今年下滑逾三分之一，并表示要么允许内容被用于 AI 总结，要么在搜索结果中失去可见度。文章还提到 Chegg 与欧洲独立媒体的相关诉讼与抗议；Google 的回应是 AI 总结让搜索更有用并能带来流量。
best_quote_en: PMC says continuing to allow Google to use its content is “adding fuel to a fire that threatens PMC’s entire publishing business.”
best_quote_zh: PMC 称，继续允许 Google 使用其内容是在“火上浇油，威胁到 PMC 整个出版业务”。

title: Demis Hassabis’ latest on AGI: Genie 3, world models, and a coming ‘scientific golden age’
title_zh: DeepMind哈萨比斯最新认知都在这里了
summary_en: QbitAI summarizes a new interview with Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis. He argues that achieving full AGI within ~10 years could usher in a ‘scientific golden age.’ Current AI lacks PhD-level breadth and true creativity, so DeepMind is building multimodal world models like Genie 3 (and video model Veo) to learn physical dynamics from video and enable interactive, consistent environments. Robots will rely on such perception–action models; DeepMind is pursuing an ‘Android-like’ OS layer for robots alongside vertically integrated designs. Hassabis sees near-term breakthroughs improving reliability, with millions of robots eventually boosting productivity, while human-shaped and task-specific forms will coexist.
summary_zh: 量子位翻译/整理了谷歌DeepMind CEO 哈萨比斯的最新访谈。他认为，若在未来约10年实现完全AGI，将开启“科学的黄金时代”。当下AI尚不具备“博士级”广度与真正创造力，因此DeepMind正通过多模态“世界模型”推进理解物理世界的能力：如Genie 3（以及文生视频模型Veo）能从海量视频中学习物理规律，生成可交互且一致性的虚拟场景。机器人将依赖此类感知—行动模型；DeepMind一方面打造跨机器人的通用操作系统层（类似“安卓模式”），另一方面探索垂直整合的端到端方案。哈萨比斯预计短期内模型可靠性将显著提升，长期会有数百万台机器人提升社会生产力，人形与专用形态将并存。
best_quote_en: “If we had full AGI in the next decade, it would usher in a scientific golden age — a new kind of Renaissance.”
best_quote_zh: “如果我们在未来十年内拥有完全的AGI，将开创一个科学的黄金时代，一种新的文艺复兴。”

title: Musk’s $1 Trillion Compensation OKRs at Tesla
title_zh: 来看看马斯克1000000000000美元薪酬OKR
summary_en: QbitAI reports Tesla’s board proposed a 10-year, zero-salary, all-options package for Elon Musk that could be worth ~$1T if extreme OKRs are hit. In 12 tranches tied to market-cap and operating goals, Musk must drive Tesla to $8.5T market cap; reach adj. EBITDA of $400B (min tier $50B); deliver 20M cars cumulatively; reach 10M active FSD subs; ship 1M Tesla robots; and deploy 1M robotaxis. If achieved, Musk’s stake could rise from ~13% to ~25% (the extra ~12% worth $1T at $8.5T). The plan needs shareholder approval at the November AGM; context includes the prior 2018 package being struck down twice in Delaware and a separate 96M-share retention RSU ($30B) to keep Musk as CEO through 2030 amid weaker Q2 results.
summary_zh: 报道称，特斯拉董事会为马斯克提出一项为期10年的“0工资、全期权”激励，若完成极高难度的OKR，潜在总价值可达约1万亿美元。方案分12档，与市值与运营指标挂钩：把特斯拉做到8.5万亿美元市值；调整后EBITDA达4000亿美元（最低档500亿美元）；累计交付2000万辆汽车；FSD活跃订阅1000万；交付100万台机器人；投运100万辆Robotaxi。全部达成后，马斯克持股可由约13%升至约25%（额外约12%在8.5万亿美元估值下约合1万亿美元）。该方案仍待11月股东大会表决；背景包括2018年期权激励两度被特拉华法院判无效，以及公司为留任推出的9600万股限制性股票（约300亿美元）与近期Q2业绩走弱。
best_quote_en: “The performance targets are the toughest ever — pushing Tesla to a market cap of $8.5 trillion.”
best_quote_zh: “绩效目标也是史上最严苛——市值要攀至8.5万亿美元。”
